name: Deliver-OOPS!
description:
As the only mailman of this chaotic town, it is YOUR job to deliver packages filled with fragile goods! This might sound like an easy task, but there will be plenty of distractions and obstacles along the way! From water spewing fire hydrants and clumsy townspeople, all the way to exploding sewer lids and racing cars, it is your job to dodge them all and safely deliver the packages!

You will have to deliver 6 packages in total, and will get 50 seconds in between deliveries, so be quick! 

You can move the character with your mouse (Click, or Click and HOLD).


CREDITS

Art Jelle Moes, Ebbo Gyssels, Remi De MeerleerProgramming Xander Berten
